data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 99,985 believers in Lempira that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Lempira, Honduras
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Lempira.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Lempira, Honduras to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 263,916 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Father, help the 99,985 believers in Lempira to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 263,916 lost friends and neighbors.
Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Turk people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Lempira, Honduras not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Lempira who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Lempira, Honduras has a population of 363,900.

We estimate Lempira has 99,985 people who might know Jesus, 248,257 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 15,659 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Lempira, Honduras, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.
